unnormalised: IIT Delhi has announced a new B.Tech program in Robotics, starting from the academic year 2024-25. The course aims to equip students with skills in AI, ML, and embedded systems, crucial for robotics development. Application deadline is 30/06/2024.
normalised: I-I-T Delhi has announced a new B. Tech program in Robotics, starting from the academic year two thousand twenty four to two thousand twenty five. The course aims to equip students with skills in A-I, M-L, and embedded systems, crucial for robotics development. Application deadline is thirtieth june two thousand twenty four.

unnormalised: The curriculum covers topics like robot kinematics, control, and perception. Students will also gain hands-on experience with robot operating systems (ROS) and various hardware platforms. Expected fees for the 4-year program is around Rs. 8 lakh.
normalised: The curriculum covers topics like robot kinematics, control, and perception. Students will also gain hands on experience with robot operating systems (R-O-S) and various hardware platforms. Expected fees for the four year program is around rupees eight lakh.

unnormalised: The program will also collaborate with industry partners like Tata Robotics & Reliance Automation, offering internship opportunities. Graduates can find jobs in sectors like manufacturing, healthcare, and logistics. Contact dept. of mech eng. for more info.
normalised: The program will also collaborate with industry partners like Tata Robotics and Reliance Automation, offering internship opportunities. Graduates can find jobs in sectors like manufacturing, healthcare, and logistics. Contact department of mechanical engineering for more info.
